title: Kat needs a nerf with her jumps
body: I personally think Kat is too op with her jumps please nerf that.

replies.body:
They did get nerfed, cant ward hop anymore.

Cant ward hop = cant run away (unless she engages you by putting w down qing you, jumping to her dagger getting the kill then jumping back to w, but that only works if she engages you and has the kill lead to kill you without the added damage from her w not the other way around)
SUPRISE!!! SHES GETTING A BUFF IN 6.24 patch

6.24 is the patch thats out right now.

As for the buff, wew 2 more damage.
